Project.Brief history of your project and organi:
DangBei was founded in August 2013 and is currently one of the well-known smart big-screen value-added service providers in China. It is committed to becoming the core entry point and home entertainment center for millions of households. The company consists of the headquarters in Hangzhou and a branch in Shenzhen, and is an Internet platform company that spans the entire ecosystem of software, hardware, and operating systems.

The company's software services more than 200 million household users, and owns the big-screen app distribution platform Dangbei Market, as well as high-quality big-screen apps such as Dangbei Video, Dangbei Music, Dangbei Desktop, Dangbei Fitness, and Dangbei Projection. In addition, it also provides Dangbei Pay and Dangbei Point SDK services for hundreds of millions of big-screen apps. Leveraging advanced AI capabilities, it provides refined user profiling, not only offering powerful traffic monetization services for developers, but also helping advertisers achieve precise marketing.
